page.title: 09LEMONADE FACTORY
page.content: The Lemonade Factory has been going for over 40 years but not always under the name of Crystal Clear and not always in the same building.This factory employs 3 people and can make up to 20 dozen bottles a day depending on demand.In a year they use 20,000 litres of water and 7 tons of sugar and sell 200,000 bottles.Of the 11 flavours, plain is the most popular, followed by Vimto. \ litre bottles from large supermarkets pose a lot of competetion. After the Lemonade has been made it is taken by truck and delivered to shops and businesses in nearly every island.
